metadata.title: CVE-2024-41028 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:platform/x86: toshiba_acpi: Fix array out-of-bounds accessIn order to use toshiba_dmi_quirks[] together with the standard DMImatching functions, it must be terminated by a empty entry.Since this entry is missing, an array out-of-bounds access occursevery time the quirk list is processed.Fix this by adding the terminating empty entry.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
